00021 #include "BaseWorldUtility.h"
00022 
00023 Define_Module(BaseWorldUtility);
00024 
00025 
00026 const double BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight = 299792458.0; //metres per second
00027 
00028 
00029 
00030 void BaseWorldUtility::initialize(int stage) {
00031   if (stage == 0) {
00032         use2DFlag = par("use2D");
00033 
00034         if (use2DFlag) {
00035             playgroundSize = Coord(par("playgroundSizeX"),
00036                                    par("playgroundSizeY"));
00037         } else {
00038             playgroundSize = Coord(par("playgroundSizeX"),
00039                                    par("playgroundSizeY"),
00040                                    par("playgroundSizeZ"));
00041         }
00042 
00043     useTorusFlag = par("useTorus");
00044        
00045     airFrameId = 0;
00046   }
00047 }
00048 
00049 Coord BaseWorldUtility::getRandomPosition()
00050 {
00051     if (use2DFlag) {
00052         return Coord(uniform(0, playgroundSize.getX()),
00053                      uniform(0, playgroundSize.getY()));
00054     } else {
00055         return Coord(uniform(0, playgroundSize.getX()),
00056                      uniform(0, playgroundSize.getY()),
00057                      uniform(0, playgroundSize.getZ()));
00058     }
00059 }
